trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked say [Enter two numbers.

Enter the larger number first.] for (3) secs ask [Enter a number less than 100:] and wait set [num1 v] to (answer) ask [Enter a number less than 10:] and wait set [num2 v] to (answer) if <(((num1) mod (10)) + (num2)) > [10]> then set [add to tidy num1 v] to ((10) - ((num1) mod (10))) set [left from num2 v] to ((num2) - (add to tidy num1)) say (join (join (join (num1) [+]) (num2)) [=?]) for (3) secs say (join (join (join (join (join (join (join [To make ] (num1)) [ a tidy number I am splitting ]) (num2)) [ into a ]) (add to tidy num1)) [ and a ]) (left from num2)) for (5) secs say (join (join [(] (join (join (num1) [+]) (join (join (join (add to tidy num1) [)]) [+]) (left from num2)))) [=]) for (5) secs say (join [] ((num1) + (num2))) else say (join (join (join (num1) [+]) (num2)) [=?]) for (5) secs say ((num1) + (num2)) end
